channel.title: HELP rep++ if i can
channel.description: Well i wanted to start coding my server offline, why offline? Cause my router seems to not have a web page. (apple one). I type my default gateway IP and it says this page does not exist, etc.. But, im going to code offline (no portforwarding), i get in my client and it says or: Error conecting (fail english sorry) to server, or, Pk planet (my client names, not my server, dont know how to change that) is offline, try again later. Is there a way me to get in my client just to code without portforwarding? if yes, in gui file, i change to what, my router default gateway ip, to my no-ip ip (exaMPL.no-ip.biz) or to my house Ip? CBO

item.title: HELP rep++ if i can
item.dc:creator: @cbo cbo
item.description:
@cbo wrote:

Well i wanted to start coding my server offline, why offline? Cause my router seems to not have a web page. (apple one). I type my default gateway IP and it says this page does not exist, etcâ€¦
But, im going to code offline (no portforwarding), i get in my client and it says or:
Error conecting (fail english sorry) to server,
or,
Pk planet (my client names, not my server, dont know how to change that) is offline, try again later.
Is there a way me to get in my client just to code without portforwarding? if yes, in gui file, i change to what, my router default gateway ip, to my no-ip ip (exaMPL.no-ip.biz) or to my house Ip?
